Name: ensure_worker_capacity
Description: No worker should be over capacity

Name: ensure_task_assignment
Description: Every task must be assigned to at least one worker

Name: ensure_feature_dependencies
Description: All feature dependencies must be met before implementation

Name: ensure_sprint_backlog_status
Description: Sprint backlog status must be active during sprint

Name: ensure_blocker_resolution
Description: Blockers must have a resolution date within 7 days of detection

Name: ensure_sprint_plan_completion
Description: Sprint plan completion rate should be at least 80%

Name: ensure_stakeholder_participation
Description: At least 5 stakeholders must participate in sprint review

Name: ensure_sprint_velocity_consistency
Description: Sprint velocity should not vary more than 10% from previous sprints

Name: ensure_feature_implementation_order
Description: High-priority features must be implemented before low-priority ones

Name: ensure_team_location_consistency
Description: Team members should not have conflicting locations
